question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. national flag
B. grey car
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The national flag is mounted on a pole in the foreground, while the grey car is on the street further down the road, making the flag clearly closer to the camera.
